segments.text: Wow , the view from the peak is so grand !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , most of the maple leaves have turned red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you ever see this kind of beautiful scene ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , my father used to take me to Kiang Shan or somewhere like that as a child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But my father did not . He didn't have much time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , I'm sorry . I promise you , this summer vacation , I will take you to Huang-Shan Mountains . It is more beautiful and magnificent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? It's a deal . Have you ever been there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I went there five years ago . You were still a baby at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It really gets me interested . Is it higher than Kiang Shan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely . You can enjoy the beauty of numerous streams and waterfalls . The sea of clouds has a fairy tale beauty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That depends . If you are lucky , you can see a vivid rainbow across over two peaks .
segments.speaker: S2
